definitions.definition: A swampy, soggy area of ground.
definitions.example: That quagmire regularly ‘swallows’ caught-up hikers' boots

definitions.definition: A perilous, mixed up and troubled situation; a hopeless tangle; a predicament.
definitions.example: The paperwork got lost in a quagmire of bureaucracy.

definitions.definition: To embroil (a person, etc.) in complexity or difficulty.
